sentences.english: All of phenomenology can be regarded as an unfolding of the idea of intentionality .
sentences.chinese: 所有的現象學都可以看作是意向性思想的延伸。

sentences.english: Heidegger revealed the necessity for explicitly restating the question of Being.
sentences.chinese: 海德格的詮釋現象學揭露了重提存有問題的必要性。

sentences.english: In the introduction, the author briefly introduces the Phenomenology of Cassier's linguistic form.
sentences.chinese: 本文導論部分，簡要闡釋卡西爾的現象學理論。

sentences.english: And this is the remote goal of his phenomenology of religion.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他的宗教現象學的遠程目標。

sentences.english: Moreover, proved the resemblance between the phenomenology and ancient philosophy in China.
sentences.chinese: 並通過對比得出現象學與中國古代哲學的共通性。

sentences.english: Ingarden is one of the main representatives of Phenomenology aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 英伽登是現象學美學的主要代表之一。

sentences.english: "Feng Shui" Architecture-Sight-planning Philosophy and Aesthetics Originating from Guanzhong;
sentences.chinese: 現象學哲學從存在論範疇研究建築美學。

sentences.english: In this horizon, further considerations of Husserlian phenomenology can be surmised .
sentences.chinese: 在此視野中，胡塞爾現象學的更深考慮可以得到猜度。

sentences.english: Phenomenology of mechanical behavior of materials at the macroscopic level.
sentences.chinese: 巨觀尺度下材料機械性質之現象學。

sentences.english: The story of modern hermeneutics begins with Edmund Husserl and his phenomenological approach.
sentences.chinese: 現代意義上的解釋學則源於胡塞爾和他的現象學方法。

sentences.english: The theory of phantasy is a very important component of Husserl's phenomenology.
sentences.chinese: 想象理論是胡塞爾現象學的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: We face at the start a phenomenological problem.
sentences.chinese: 而我們則打一開始就面臨着一個現象學的問題。

sentences.english: The second part tries to clear up the meaning of love in the emotional phenomenology.
sentences.chinese: 從而爲第二章情感現象學的愛的理解做好鋪墊。

sentences.english: The central theme of phenomenology is intentionality.
sentences.chinese: 現象學的中心主題就是意向性。

sentences.english: The Phenomenology is attached to this system and ordered under it.
sentences.chinese: 現象學附屬於這個體系並且在其統領之下。

sentences.english: This discovery made him abolish the idea of phenomenology eventually.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現最終導致了維氏對於現象學的放棄。

definition: Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
